column4: I have a program that needs Internet Explorer, I tried to install ie4linux and ie7 but I can't find shortcuts for either can anyone help?
nothing in ~/bin ?
I don't see either ie4linux or ie7 there alphabetically or otherwise
i think it install them to ~/.ie4linux
I found the ie4linux by "showing hidden files".  How do I get it to run?
a file or a directory ?
a directory.  files are .png and .svg
2 .exe files 249973usa8.exe and dcom98.exe
did you run the installer or just downloaded and extracted it?
ran the installer
try reinstalling it
reinstalled, checked show hidden files, installed kommander but no luck. Any suggestions?
did you watch the terminal for any error messages? and still nothing in ~/bin ?
install was over quickly.  still nothing in bin
are you using the graphical or the command line installer? try passing --help
to find the option for the terminal-only installer
not sure that I understand, sorry...
can you explain your last instruction?
http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=10186941&postcount=14
to auto complete a nickname on IRC, type the first few letters and press TAB
got the tab thing, thanks
thanks for your help. it actually was 2 files I had to edit.  appreciate it and happy holidays
you're welcome
